attributes.action: Reduce bankers' pensions and restore the money to the tax payers' purse.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Government should reduce bankers' pensions. If it takes an Act of Parliament then the Government should have the backbone to bring in the necessary legislation.  It would be an obscenity to reward bankers who put the Country into financial crisis resulting in so much hardship.
Fred Goodwin's pension of £700,000.00 per year is more than many  people earn for a lifetime of work.  Hardworking people are once again suffering whilst fat cats get richer, this is the stuff of revolution, but I expect the bankers will just say "let them eat cake
